title: Money making guide/Making sacred oil

properties.name: description
properties.value: Sacred oil is a vial of blessed olive oil that is used to make Pyre logs. It is obtained from the Shades of Mort'ton minigame, by using vials of olive oil on the Fire Altar, once the temple has been fully repaired and the altar lit. Converting olive oil to sacred oil costs sanctity points, which are gained by repairing the temple's walls or by killing the Loar Shades that attack the temple. Each dose of olive oil costs about 0.9% sanctity to convert; a 4-dose vial of olive oil will cost about 3.6% sanctity to convert into sacred oil. Additionally, players must have at least 10% sanctity in order to convert olive oil into sacred oil.

content:
Sacred oil is a vial of blessed olive oil that is used to make Pyre logs. It is obtained from the Shades of Mort'ton minigame, by using vials of olive oil on the Fire Altar, once the temple has been fully repaired and the altar lit. Converting olive oil to sacred oil costs sanctity points, which are gained by repairing the temple's walls or by killing the Loar Shades that attack the temple. Each dose of olive oil costs about 0.9% sanctity to convert; a 4-dose vial of olive oil will cost about 3.6% sanctity to convert into sacred oil. Additionally, players must have at least 10% sanctity in order to convert olive oil into sacred oil.

Sacred oil's sole use is to create pyre logs, which may be used to cremate the remains of various shades. Pyre logs are made by adding sacred oil to logs, which grants between 12 and 16 Firemaking experience per set of logs, depending on the tier of logs used. Additionally, different logs require different amounts of sacred oil, with low-end logs requiring 2 doses and high-end logs requiring 4 doses. If you haven't completed the Shades of Mort'ton quest, you will not be able to use sacred oil to create pyre logs.

Cremating shade remains in Mort'ton is necessary to obtain various keys that allow access to the Shade Catacombs and the reward chests within. In both cases, Firemaking and Prayer experience are gained in the process.


Item Price per dose Sacred oil(1) 401 Sacred oil(2) 325 Sacred oil(3) 561 Sacred oil(4) 416

Approximately 300-400 Sacred oil can be produced per hour depending on crafting level higher crafting levels will gain sanctity points faster increaing production. Also a Flamtaer bracelet will increase yield per hour as it speeds up gaining points if repairing temple for sanctity.

At around 2000 gp each you can expect a profit of around 600k-800k an hour.

Log into the designated Shades of Mo'orton world. You will need an inventory of olive oil along with the supplies to repair the temple. Recommended to bring flamtaer bracelet to speed up points as this is faster than killing shades for points. Although if on a budget shades can be killed to get sanctity points.

Also recommended to obtain Flamtaer bag as soon as possible as this makes it much easier to carry the supplies to repair the temple.

A stub is an article which does not cover all information available about the topic. You can help by expanding it.
rawContent:
Sacred oil is a vial of blessed [[olive oil]] that is used to make [[Pyre logs (disambiguation)|Pyre logs]]. It is obtained from the [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|Shades of Mort'ton]] minigame, by using vials of olive oil on the Fire Altar, once the temple has been fully repaired and the altar lit. Converting olive oil to sacred oil costs sanctity points, which are gained by repairing the temple's walls or by killing the [[Loar Shade]]s that attack the temple. Each dose of olive oil costs about 0.9% sanctity to convert; a 4-dose vial of olive oil will cost about 3.6% sanctity to convert into sacred oil. Additionally, players must have at least 10% sanctity in order to convert olive oil into sacred oil.

Sacred oil's sole use is to create pyre logs, which may be used to cremate the remains of various shades. Pyre logs are made by adding sacred oil to logs, which grants between 12 and 16 Firemaking experience per set of logs, depending on the tier of logs used. Additionally, different logs require different amounts of sacred oil, with low-end logs requiring 2 doses and high-end logs requiring 4 doses. If you haven't completed the [[Shades of Mort'ton]] quest, you will not be able to use sacred oil to create pyre logs.

Cremating shade remains in [[Mort'ton]] is necessary to obtain various keys that allow access to the Shade Catacombs and the reward chests within. In both cases, [[Firemaking]] and [[Prayer]] experience are gained in the process.



Item	       Price per dose
Sacred oil(1)	401
Sacred oil(2)	325
Sacred oil(3)	561
Sacred oil(4)	416

Approximately 300-400 Sacred oil can be produced per hour depending on crafting level higher crafting levels will gain sanctity points faster increaing production. Also a Flamtaer bracelet will increase yield per hour as it speeds up gaining points if repairing temple for sanctity.

At around 2000 gp each you can expect a profit of around 600k-800k an hour.

Log into the designated Shades of Mo'orton world. You will need an inventory of olive oil along with the supplies to repair the temple. 
Recommended to bring flamtaer bracelet to speed up points as this is faster than killing shades for points. Although if on a budget shades can be killed to get sanctity points.

Also recommended to obtain Flamtaer bag as soon as possible as this makes it much easier to carry the supplies to repair the temple.
